changeSet.author: hharidas
changeSet.comment: As many disease names are being changed, backup the table before making changes (horizondisease and horizondiseasetemplate tables).
changeSet.rollback: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `prodlims`.`horizondisease_backup_eng5408`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `prodlims`.`horizondiseasetemplate_backup_eng5408`;

changeSet.author: hharidas
changeSet.comment: Update the disease names in all applicable fields in horizondisease and horizondiseasetemplate tables.
